sentences.sContent: Edison is credited with the invention of the phonograph.
sentences.sContent_eng: Edison is credited with the invention of the phonograph.
sentences.sCn: 留声机的发明应归功于爱迪生。

sentences.sContent: American inventor Thomas Edison, who was considered the father of sound recording, developed the phonograph in 1877, the first device to record music in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: American inventor Thomas Edison, who was considered the father of sound recording, developed the phonograph in 1877, the first device to record music in the world.
sentences.sCn: 被誉为录音之父的美国发明家托马斯·爱迪生于1877年发明了留声机，这是世界上第一台录音设备。
